All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Interface com.icl.saxon.ElementHandler

public interface ElementHandler
This interface defines the element handler used by the SAXON distributor.

afterGroup(ElementInfo)
Define action to be taken after a group of one or more consecutive elements of the same element type.
beforeGroup(ElementInfo)
Define action to be taken before a group of one or more consecutive elements of the same element type.
characters(ElementInfo, char[], int, int)
Define action to be taken with character data belonging to this element type.
endElement(ElementInfo)
Define action to be taken after an element of this element type.
ignorable(ElementInfo, char[], int, int)
Define action to be taken with ignorable white space belonging to this element type.
startElement(ElementInfo)
Define action to be taken before an element of this element type.

beforeGroup 
 public abstract void beforeGroup(ElementInfo e) throws SAXException
Define action to be taken before a group of one or more consecutive elements of the same element type. (That is, before every element of this type unless it was immediately preceded by another element of the same type.)

Parameters:
e - The ElementInfo object for the first element in the group.
startElement 
 public abstract void startElement(ElementInfo e) throws SAXException
Define action to be taken before an element of this element type.

Parameters:
e - The ElementInfo object for the current element.
endElement 
 public abstract void endElement(ElementInfo e) throws SAXException
Define action to be taken after an element of this element type.

Parameters:
e - The ElementInfo object for the current element.
afterGroup 
 public abstract void afterGroup(ElementInfo e) throws SAXException
Define action to be taken after a group of one or more consecutive elements of the same element type. (That is, before an element of a different type that is immediately preceded by an element of this type.)

Parameters:
e - The ElementInfo object for the last element in the group.
characters 
 public abstract void characters(ElementInfo e,
                                 char ch[],
                                 int start,
                                 int len) throws SAXException
Define action to be taken with character data belonging to this element type.

Parameters:
e - The ElementInfo object describing the XML element containing this character data.
ch - A character array containing the character data
start - Offset of the character data within the array
length - Length of the character data within the array
ignorable 
 public abstract void ignorable(ElementInfo e,
                                char ch[],
                                int start,
                                int len) throws SAXException
Define action to be taken with ignorable white space belonging to this element type.

Parameters:
e - The ElementInfo object describing the XML element containing this ignorable white space.
ch - A character array containing the white space
start - Offset of the white space within the array
length - Length of the white space within the array
